Name: FORCES
Restrictions: block dense, uses server (can be configured to own server)
How to obtain license?: Online, trial license is active instantly
How to install?: Download client, add to python path

Name: FORCESNLP
Algorithm: SQP (affine inequalities online) - Interior point - ADMM
Notes: Seems to use same software-packet as FORCES

Name: KNITRO
Interface languages: C, C++, Julia, Python, Fortran, Java, Matlab

Name: NLOPT
Interface languages: C++, Fortran, Python, Matlab, OCaml, Rust, Julia, GNU R

Name: NMPC
Notes: This is a book, referencing to YANE for code

Name: Gekko/APMonitor
How to install?: pip install gekko / pip install APMonitor

Name: MATMPC
How to install?: Just use the files in repo, nothing needs to be installed

Name: Trajopt
Algorithm: SQP, box trust region, Lie algebra, signed distance using penetration depth, swept volume, multiples shooitng and direct collocation
Notes: No updates happened in the last 6 years? CMake written for python2 ...

Name: RobCoGen
Interface level: Rigid body library with OCP extensions

Name: Crocoddyl
How to install?: conda install crocoddyl -c conda-forge (version is not always the newest)

Name: UNO
Interface languages: C++, AMPL modelling language (.mod file extension)

Name: HILO-MPC
Notes: Also does estimation, machine learning & modelling

Name: CHOMP
Algorithm: unconstrained Newton step with Hess part coming from L2 distance wrt to previous iteration, distance transform, joint limits in objective or projection in-bounds, obstacle codes is penalty integrated over path length

Name: STOMP
Algorithm: derivative free optimization, obstacles: self= collection of spheres

Name: GPMP
Algorithm: State traj is Gaussian Process (states may be sampled at different freq), smells like Matrix-Lyap diff eq, Mahalanobis distance, integral of collision cost, unconstrained Newton step with Hess part coming from L2 distance wrt to previous iteration, emphasis on fast interpolation with GP, constraints handled by r projection in-bounds
